athenaPrompt: Imagine work getting easier, not just documented. Ask Athena now.

prompt.text: If you're hiring faster than you're fixing processes...

body.text: Cut what's broken. Fix what matters. Leave the rest alone. We find the 20% of processes causing 80% of your pain, eliminate unnecessary steps, and rebuild the critical paths. Not process for process sake. Process that actually makes work easier.

metadata.template: Four weeks. By {result} your team will spend less time managing workflows and more time doing actual work.

share.subject: Worth looking at: Process Surgery
share.body:
Hey,

I came across this and thought it might help with [ADD_YOUR_CHALLENGE_HERE].

It's called Process Surgery. They find the 20% of processes causing 80% of pain, eliminate unnecessary steps, and rebuild critical paths. Process that makes work easier, not just documented.

Four weeks, starts at £10,000.

If we talk to them next week, we could have results by {deliveryDate}.

Here's the link: {url}

Worth a conversation?
